resources.string: Drag or tap to change map bottom sheet visibility.
Searching for nothing is not very useful
Tapping or pulling up this bar will open more options for the map including layer selection and legend.
Type in this area to search. Tapping on the magnifying glass on the right triggers the search, or you can use your keyboards search button, if it has one.
Tapping on this button moves you to your location. Map will follow your location until you move the map manually. Tapping on it again while following shows you the direction you are facing.
Selecting date range can show you only data for the range you desire.
No worries, you can always bring it back up with a gentle tap on the map.
Precise location access is needed to display your location on the map.
